job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the role involves building and implementing solutions, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You will take on the engineering part for the team, optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions.
job_tasks.justification: The term 'engineering part' and 'optimising code efficiency' clearly point to software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: In doing so, you will help drive innovation in technologies and foster a culture of continuous improvement
job_tasks.justification: Driving innovation in technologies and fostering continuous improvement are common goals within software development teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines and automating security controls are fundamental MLOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new cloud services and optimizing product performance through testing are activities common to software development and platform engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge
job_tasks.justification: Sharing software engineering knowledge implies practical application and development skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining a code library with a focus on best practices is a key software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible
job_tasks.justification: Developing SDK solutions involves software engineering and integration with cloud services.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role's objective is to advance the company's capabilities in specific business areas (data science and generative AI).

soft_skills.phrase: take the lead in developing innovative solutions
promoting technology in the data science community
liaison for of the PostNL engineering community
first to test and work with new tools and techniques from the market
optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions
Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge
focusing on best practices and innovation
pushing the boundaries of what is possible
work closely with each other and with other (innovation) teams

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes full-stack development, MLOps (CI/CD, automation), and working with data science platforms. While generative AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities and tasks focus on the engineering and operational aspects of implementing these technologies rather than core model development or fine-tuning of generative models.
